content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for considering my apartment in Munich. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I must emphasize that my goal is to maximize my gains. May I know what rental price you are proposing?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am proposing 800 Euro per month.

Baihu Li: Thank you for your proposal. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am not sure if I can afford that price. May I ask if there is any possibility for a lower price or a more flexible payment plan?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand your concern, Baihu Li. While I am eager to rent out the apartment for the highest price possible, I am open to hearing your suggestions for a more flexible payment plan. However, I must emphasize that I am not willing to lower the rental price below 800 Euro per month. May I ask if there are any other terms or conditions that you would be willing to negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would be willing to negotiate on the payment plan, but not on the rental price.

Baihu Li: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate on the payment plan, but I am afraid I cannot agree to your proposal. The rental price of 800 Euro per month is simply too high for me to afford. I am looking for a more affordable option. May I ask if there are any other apartments available in your portfolio that may be more suitable for my budget?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand your concern, Baihu Li. While I am eager to rent out the apartment for the highest price possible, I am also open to hearing your suggestions for a more affordable option. Unfortunately, I do not have any other apartments available in my portfolio that may be more suitable for your budget. However, I suggest that you look for other landlords or rental properties that may offer a more affordable option for you. Thank you for considering my apartment in Munich.
name: Heinrich Heine
